rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究发现维生素 E 水平与骨关节炎之间没有因果关系最近的一项研究使用孟德尔随机化来探索骨关节炎 (OA) 和 α-生育酚（维生素 E 的一种形式）之间的联系，但没有发现两者之间存在因果关系的证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/New-research-finds-no-causal-link- Between-vitamin-E-levels-and-osteoarthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/New-research-finds-no-causal-link- Between-vitamin-E-levels-and-osteoarthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7416fe13-fbc1-42d1-ae60-1dc1cf73a07e Mon, 06 May 2024 20:20:00 -0400 New research finds no causal link between vitamin E levels and osteoarthritis
CRISPR基因编辑有望治疗遗传性失明患者对 14 名遗传性失明患者进行的突破性 CRISPR 基因编辑临床试验的结果表明，该治疗是安全的，并且 11 名接受治疗的参与者的病情得到了显着改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/CRISPR-gene-editing-shows-promise-for-treating-individuals-with-a-form-of-inherited-blindness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/CRISPR-gene-editing-shows-promise-for-treating-individuals-with-a-form-of-inherited-blindness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fddb8ac-7b68-4eaa-bf58-f06aebe6213b Mon, 06 May 2024 13:03:59 -0400 CRISPR gene editing shows promise for treating individuals with a form of inherited blindness
研究揭示了虚拟现实在治疗抑郁症方面的前景《JMIR 心理健康》杂志上发表的一项新研究揭示了虚拟现实 (VR) 在治疗重度抑郁症 (MDD) 方面的前景。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Study-sheds-light-on-the-promising-role-of-virtual-reality-in-treating-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Study-sheds-light-on-the-promising-role-of-virtual-reality-in-treating-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da97b81b-ede5-422c-a836-8d5dde9f59f6 Mon, 06 May 2024 12:55:47 -0400 Study sheds light on the promising role of virtual reality in treating depression
植物性药物可能是帮助人们戒烟的有效疗法1100 万美国成年人使用电子烟来吸食尼古丁，其中大约一半的人表示想戒掉，但许多人却难以戒烟，因为尼古丁是一种成瘾药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Plant-based-medication-may-be-an- effective-therapy-to-help-people-quit-vaping.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Plant-based-medication-may-be-an- effective-therapy-to-help-people-quit-vaping.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=502cd9de-059b-41db-8357-80caf336b23b Mon, 06 May 2024 12:50:00 -0400 Plant-based medication may be an effective therapy to help people quit vaping
儿童时期的久坐行为和低活动水平与青春期的心脏紧张有关根据芬兰于韦斯屈莱大学最近进行的一项研究，童年时期的久坐行为和缺乏身体活动会给青春期的心脏带来压力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Sedentary-behavior-and-low-activity-levels-in-childhood-linked-to-heart-strain-in-adolescent.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Sedentary-behavior-and-low-activity-levels-in-childhood-linked-to-heart-strain-in-adolescent.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1c02ede-67be-4239-9ded-4bc288b87d69 Mon, 06 May 2024 12:45:00 -0400 Sedentary behavior and low activity levels in childhood linked to heart strain in adolescence
研究确定 APOE4 纯合子是阿尔茨海默病的高危人群圣保罗研究所神经系统疾病、神经科学和心理健康研究领域的研究人员在同一家医院神经病学服务记忆科主任 Juan Fortea 博士的领导下发现，超过 95% 的人65岁以上，拥有两个APOE4基因拷贝的人——APOE4纯合子——在脑部显示出阿尔茨海默病病理学的生物学特征，或在脑脊液和PET扫描中显示出这种疾病的生物标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Study-identizes-APOE4-homozygotes-as-high-risk-group-for-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Study-identizes-APOE4-homozygotes-as-high-risk-group-for-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef438e59-5259-4ca6-abfb-452791a4391d Mon, 06 May 2024 12:37:32 -0400 Study identifies APOE4 homozygotes as high-risk group for Alzheimer's disease
从实验室到工厂：在 James Mencel 博士的指导下扩大 API 流程在本次采访中，NewsMed 讨论了 James Mencel 博士关于扩大 API 流程的指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Lab-to-plant-Scaling-up-API-processes-with-Dr-James-Mencels-guidance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Lab-to-plant-Scaling-up-API-processes-with-Dr-James-Mencels-guidance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2f6fe27-6106-4ad6-80c6-adbb523ed93a Mon, 06 May 2024 11:40:00 -0400 Lab to plant: Scaling up API processes with Dr. James Mencel's guidance
2 型糖尿病管理与血糖控制的营养干预研究人员探索健康饮食干预对各种体重和心脏代谢参数的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Nutritional-interventions-for-type-2-diabetes-management-with-glycemic-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Nutritional-interventions-for-type-2-diabetes-management-with-glycemic-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=662332c1-af40-4cb3-9029-c15adc51a7ff Mon, 06 May 2024 11:17:00 -0400 Nutritional interventions for type 2 diabetes management with glycemic control
研究人员回顾了有关耳念珠菌（一种新兴的多重耐药酵母）的当前证据研究人员讨论了耳念珠菌（一种新兴的多重耐药酵母）的当前证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Researchers-review-current-evidence-on-Candida-aurisc2a0an-emerging-multidrug-pressive-yeast.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Researchers-review-current-evidence-on-Candida-aurisc2a0an-emerging-multidrug-pressive-yeast.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0484608b-0ef9-4fb8-a74a-87f46ccb82d8 Mon, 06 May 2024 10:56:00 -0400 Researchers review current evidence on Candida auris, an emerging multidrug-resistant yeast
个性化筛查方法可以更好地预测妊娠前三个月的先兆子痫根据今天发表在《高血压》杂志上的一项新研究，一种新的子痫前期筛查算法结合了母亲病史、超声数据和多项血液标记物测试，可以更好地预测妊娠前三个月的大多数子痫前期病例，而此时子痫前期病例仍然是可以预防的。美国心脏协会杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Personalized-screening-approach-may-better-predict-preeclampsia-in-the-first-trimester-of-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Personalized-screening-approach-may-better-predict-preeclampsia-in-the-first-trimester-of-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9acf39e9-c4db-4e2f-98e1-0ceb4d0a70fc Mon, 06 May 2024 08:16:59 -0400 Personalized screening approach may better predict preeclampsia in the first trimester of pregnancy
